title: "Our People"

## Steering committee

```{r, echo = F}
pacman::p_load(readxl)
people <- read_excel("Resources/our_people_content.xlsx")

info <- function(x){
  # Name
  cat(paste0("", people[x,1]), fill = T)
  # Title
  cat(paste0("Title: ", people[x,2]), fill = T)
  # Email
  cat(paste0("Email: ", people[x,3]), fill = T)
  # Website
  if(!is.na(people[x,4])){
  cat(paste0("Website: ", people[x,4]), fill = T)
  }
  # Personal website
  if(!is.na(people[x,5])){
  cat(paste0("Personal Website: ", people[x,5]), fill = T)
  }
  if(!is.na(people[x,6])){
  cat(paste0("", people[x,6]), fill = T)
  }
  cat("", fill = T)
  cat("", fill = T)
}
```

```{r, echo = F}
for(i in 1:10){
  info(i)
}
```


## Affiliates

```{r, echo = F}
for(i in 11:nrow(people)){
  info(i)
}
```
